title: League client went corrupt and vanished
body: So it was just today, and I was getting on the client to log in, after a few failed attempts to get it to launch a 'mandatory' update, the login client went corrupt, and all of a sudden, it just disappeared, cant even find the files, if there's anyway I can get a link to just download the new client instead of going back to the old one, it would be highly appreciated :), also I'm sorry if I'm sounding a tad bit rude, I get a bit mad when these things tend to pop up.

replies.body: Oh wow, that's pretty weird that the entire installation would completely disappear. I'd make first make sure that something wasn't just moved by looking through the default file path C:\Riot Games\League of Legends, otherwise you can find the [**download here**](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/download).
i think some files got deleted, since whenever i press launch to actually log in, it wont even take me to the log-in screen, what files should i check?

Ahhhh that sounds like a relatively simply permissions issue. Let's make sure League has the correct admin settings in place by following our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Hit me back up if that doesn't help though!
